items.title: 'I missed Lisbon funicular commute that killed my friend'
items.summary: By the time Sonia Silva arrived at the stop, the funicular had crashed and her friend was dead.

items.title: Iraq foils major human smuggling attempts, arrests 194 migrants
items.summary: BAGHDAD, Sept. 5 (Xinhua) -- Iraq's National Security Service (INSS) said on Friday it had foiled two major attempts to smuggle foreigners into the country, detaining 194 people who had entered illegally. Read full story

items.title: Best of IFA 2025: All of the wild new concepts, gadgets, and new releases in tech from this year’s show
items.summary:
IFA 2025 is now in full swing with all the latest in consumer tech, wild concepts, and more. Robots for your robots that climb stairs, lawn mowers that play fetch with your dog, the latest Qi2.2 25W MagSafe tech, modular charging stations, flagship headphones, the latest in gaming handhelds, Gemini smart TVs, and new tablets have all surfaced over the last couple days, and you’ll find the most interesting new gear on display from IFA 2025 collected for you down below.

items.title: Xizang sees sound progress in women, children healthcare services, outcomes
items.summary: LHASA, Sept. 5 (Xinhua) -- By the end of 2024, the maternal and infant mortality rates in southwest China's Xizang Autonomous Region had both fallen to historic lows, marking significant improvements in women's and children's health services in the region, according to local authorities on Friday. Read full story

items.title: Tesla’s ad spend on X has shrunk to almost nothing
items.summary: Tesla spent a fraction on X in early 2025 compared to 2024. It also paid $300,000 to Kimbal Musk's drone company.

items.title: Hamas releases video of two Israeli hostages held in Gaza
items.summary: The video claims to show the hostages in Gaza City, where Israel has begun a planned military takeover.

items.title: Zelenskiy meets Slovakia's Fico, says Ukraine will respond to Russia's energy attacks
items.summary: (Reuters) -President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Friday that Ukraine would continue to respond to Russian attacks on its energy facilities, despite criticism from Slovakia and Hungary which have suffered Russian oil supply disruptions as a result. Read full story

items.title: Warner Bros. sues Midjourney for AI images of Superman, Batman, and other characters
items.summary: Warner Bros. says that Midjourney knowingly engaged in wrongful conduct, noting that the company previously restricted subscribers from generating content based on infringing images but recently lifted those protections.

items.title: Pick up MANSCAPED’s The Lawn Mower 4.0 while it’s down at $69.50 (Reg. $90)
items.summary:
MANSCAPED The Lawn Mower 4.0 Hair Trimmer

Buy for $69.50 (Reg. $90)

What we love

Keep unwanted hair at bay with the MANSCAPED’s official The Lawn Mower 4.0. Inside the box you’ll find the trimmer itself, four guards so you can dial in the ideal cutting length, and more. I like that the ceramic blades can be swapped on this. Pair that with the big brand that goes along with it and you have a unit that you can invest in once and maintain for years to come.

items.title: The Lenovo Legion Go 2 will get Xbox-flavored Windows in spring 2026
items.summary: The just-fully-announced Legion Go 2 will be the first handheld outside of Asus that’s confirmed to get the new Xbox full-screen experience (FSE). Lenovo spokesperson Jeff Witt tells me buyers will be able to manually switch the handheld to Xbox FSE after it’s ready in the spring 2026 time frame, months after the Legion Go […]

items.title: Govee’s Matter-ready Strip Light with Skyline Kits at new and returning low prices starting from $80 (Reg. $120+)
items.summary:
Coming to us through its official Amazon storefront, Govee is now offering the best prices yet on its latest Strip Light with Skyline Kit sizes, with the 13.1-foot model down at $79.99 shipped, which beats out the brand’s direct website by $5, and the 19.7-foot model down at $99.99 shipped, which beats out the direct site pricing by $10. These newer lighting options hit the market back in May with $120 and $150 price tags, which we’ve seen go as low as $84 and $100 – both during July’s Prime Day event. While the larger size is returning to its all-time low rate for the second time, this is a first-time drop for the smaller size that marks a new all-time low there.

items.title: Google fined $3.5 billion by EU for ad tech abuse
items.summary: The European Commission has waged a €2.95 billion (~$3.5 billion) fine against Google for “abusing its dominant position” in advertising technology. In its announcement, the Commission claims that Google’s alleged anticompetitive practices have increased costs for advertisers and publishers, potentially raising prices for consumers as a result. The Commission has ordered Google to come up […]

items.title: China-SCO innovation center welcomes first doctoral cohort
items.summary: HARBIN, Sept. 5 (Xinhua) -- The China-Shanghai Cooperation Organization (SCO) Doctoral Training Innovation Center held its opening ceremony at the Harbin Institute of Technology (HIT) in northeast China's Heilongjiang Province, welcoming its first cohort of 120 doctoral students from SCO member states. Read full story

items.title: Lisbon funicular worker among those killed in crash
items.summary: Four employees of a non-profit organisation and a transport worker are among those who died.

items.title: Canada's unemployment rate rises to record high in August
items.summary: OTTAWA, Sept. 5 (Xinhua) -- Canada's unemployment rate rose to 7.1 percent in August, the highest since May 2016, said Statistics Canada on Friday. Read full story

items.title: Russia lists local apps that will survive its internet blackouts
items.summary: (Reuters) -Russia published a list of locally developed social media, ride-hailing and other apps that it said would keep working during its mobile internet shutdowns - blackouts that have often been ordered to disrupt Ukrainian drone attacks. Read full story

items.title: Hundreds of South Koreans detained in massive ICE raid at Hyundai plant
items.summary: Most of the 475 arrested were from South Korea, leading the country to call the raid an unjust infringement of people's rights.

items.title: China's Hainan to host 11th World Free Zones Organization Annual Congress
items.summary: HAIKOU, Sept. 5 (Xinhua) -- The 11th edition of the World Free Zones Organization (World FZO) Annual Congress will be held in Haikou, the capital of south China's Hainan Province, from Oct. 10 to 12, local authorities announced on Friday. Read full story

items.title: China's Hanjiang River sees first flood of 2025 following torrential rain
items.summary: BEIJING, Sept. 5 (Xinhua) -- The Hanjiang River, a major tributary of the Yangtze River, has seen its first flood of the year following torrential rain, according to the Ministry of Water Resources. Read full story

items.title: Natron’s liquidation shows why the US isn’t ready to make its own batteries
items.summary: The sodium-ion battery startup went from announcing a $1.4 billion factory to filing for liquidation in just over a year. Natron's troubled journey illustrates the challenges in making batteries in the U.S.

items.title: An integrated 65W USB-C port and travel-friendly design headline this 7-in-1 power strip at $26 (Save 43%)
items.summary:
ORICO 7-in-1 65W USB-C Travel Power Strip

Buy for $26 (Reg. $46)

Clip the on-page $5 off coupon.

What we love

If you want a power strip that’s made with travel in mind, this affordable solution is worth a look. Unlike a majority of the solutions we often cover, this one boasts a USB-C port that can deliver up to 65W of power. That’s enough to top off everything from smartphones to tablets, and a majority of laptops as well. I love that this power strip features a wrap-around design for the cord to slot nicely in place when it is not in use.

more…

items.title: Just $16 gets you 8BitDo’s pocket-sized Micro gamepad that doubles as a shortcut controller for iOS, iPad, and more (35% off)
items.summary:
8BitDo’s pocket-sized Micro gamepad

Buy for $16 (Reg. $22)

What we love

This compact, pocketable, gamepad is among the smallest you’ll find on the market, and it weighs just 24.8 grams. Despite its size, it packs a 180mAh battery for up to 10 hours of playtime and even supports wired USB-C connection to work with Switch, Android, Raspberry Pi, and more. What we particularly like about this model is its Keyboard Mode, which lets you use it across PC, Android, Mac, iOS, and iPad setups not just for gaming, but also for triggering shortcuts in productivity apps.

items.title: IFA 2025 gives us a look at the ambitious Master X Series robot lawn mower concept with a mechanical arm
items.summary:
This year’s IFA event in Berlin has already given us many new tech reveals, with a bunch of robotic lawn mowers showcased amongst them, but there’s one that is standing out amongst the crowd with its very unique concept design. Coming from MOVA’s sub-brand, NexLawn, we’ve been introduced to the Master X Series Concept, described as “the first robotic mower with a fully functional mechanical arm.” What’s more, this arm isn’t being planned to limit itself only to mowing-related jobs, with more versatility thanks to interchangeable attachments – including pet interactions too! Head below to learn more about this ambitious robot.

items.title: EcoFlow’s short-term member-only deals drop DELTA 2 Max 440W solar bundle with free bag to new $1,282 low (Reg. $3,276), more
items.summary:
Running parallel to its extended Labor Day Sale, EcoFlow is also having a Home Backup Sale through September 14 with up to 62% discounts, 5% and 7% bonus savings, and more. Among the lineup, we’re seeing shorter-term member-only pricing on four units lasting through September 7, with a standout being EcoFlow’s DELTA 2 Max Portable Power Station coming with two 220W solar panels and a waterproof protective bag for $1,281.55 shipped, after using the code 25EFDCAFF at checkout for an additional 5% off your order. This particular bundle would cost you $3,276 were it at full price, with the bag missing from this bundle at Amazon, where it’s currently priced for $1,299, and has only gone as low as $1,234 in the past. Considering the bag costs $79, this combined 61% markdown for the next few days not only saves you a total $1,994, but gives you the best new price we have tracked. Head below for more on this and the other short-term member-only deals.

more…

items.title: First deal on a new 25W MagSafe car charger now live ahead of iPhone 17 launch
items.summary:
UGREEN was one of the first brands to roll out new Qi2.2 25W wireless charging gear, and it’s already discounting several of its latest chargers ahead of next week’s iPhone 17 reveal. After kicking things off with a deal on its 25W Qi2.2 MagFlow power bank, UGREEN’s official storefront is now offering the new 25W wireless car charger for $29.99 with Prime shipping (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise). This is the first deal we’re tracking on this unit since its debut last month, making it a great time to cash in and snag one for your car and keep it ready for the upcoming iPhone 17. Today’s deal shaves $10 off its usual going rate, and it even comes with a 3.3-foot USB-C cable in the box. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: Motorola’s 2025 Razr flip phone now $100 off at Amazon, 1TB Razr Ultra still $400 off the list price
items.summary:
Update: This deal is now live once again on Amazon – the direct Moto offers on the Ultra are also still live. Details below in the original post.

We are still tracking a particularly notable $400 price on the unlocked 2025 Motorola Razr Ultra smartphones right now. But that one, despite the seriously deep deal, is still going to fetch you nearly double the price of the standard 2025 Moto Razr flip phone, and we are now tracking every color at $100 off courtesy of the official site. This deal is also live over at Amazon on select colroways.

Now just days away from the official reveal from iPhone 17, excitement is ramping up for the next-generation Apple handsets (not to mention loads of leaked details and images over at 9to5Mac). For those looking to trade-up for the new model, or just pre-order one when everything goes live (likely next week), the ongoing slate of discounts on iPhone 15 and 16 are much less exciting, but for those looking for a deal there is as much as $730 in savings live right now courtesy of Amazon.

items.title: Enjoy smooth commutes and space-saving functionality on Heybike’s Horizon full suspension folding e-bike at $1,399 ($600 off)
items.summary:
As part of Heybike’s ongoing End of Summer Sale, which is offering up to $649 savings on its e-bike lineup alongside the usual free gear bundles, we wanted to shine a spotlight on the brand’s Horizon Full Suspension Folding e-bike that is down at $1,399 shipped while the event lasts and comes with a free front and rear cargo basket bundle. This model usually fetches $1,999 outside of sales, which we’ve mostly seen brought down to $1,499 over 2025, with more recent drops to $1,399 and a one-time fall further to the $1,299 low that appeared during the brand’s anniversary sale back at the end of May. Aside from that one-time low, you’re otherwise looking at the best price we have tracked, which saves you $600 on one of the brand’s more premium space-saving commuting solutions.

items.title: Anker’s new 25W Qi2.2 MagGo Prime Wireless Car Charger is official w/ early-bird pricing at 30% off
items.summary:
Anker’s IFA showing this year has been rather noteworthy, from AI-powered voice recorders, super new higher-power portable battery solutions, and its new 25W MagSafe charging stand with an onboard display, but it’s new MagGo Prime Wireless Car Charger seems to be slipping under the radar a bit. Featuring 25W of juice, and among the first MagSafe car charger to do so, it is now confirmed for an upcoming release and is eligible for the early-bird discounts we featured this morning.

items.title: Get a FREE 100W braided right-angle USB-C cable with Baseus’ 10-in-1 desktop charging station at $30 low ($65 in value)
items.summary:
Courtesy of Baseus’ official Amazon storefront, you can now score its 10-in-1 67W charging station for $29.99 with free shipping for Prime members or in orders over $35. It also comes with the brand’s 100W braided right-angle USB-C cable for FREE today – simply add both of them to your cart and checkout. The discounted 10-in-1 charging station typically goes for $50, so you’re looking at a solid 40% markdown that takes $20 off its usual going rate. It’s now matching the lowest price we first saw back in April, but today’s deal delivers better value thanks to the included 100W cable that typically goes for $15. Head below for more details.

items.title: Jackery weekend flash sale offers up to $1,200 savings on HomePower 3000 station and bundle at new lows starting from $1,499
items.summary:
Jackery’s Disaster Preparedness Sale running through September 16 is seeing up to 50% discounts across its power station lineup, complete with automatic 5% and 7% extra savings on orders over $1,300, as well as some free gifts accompanying the largest Explorer 5000 Plus series units. A standout, though, is the flash offer lasting only through the weekend on the latest HomePower 3000 Portable Power Station at $1,499 shipped, which comes in a little under Amazon by $4. Since its release back in May, we’ve seen it brought down from its full $2,499 price tag to land between $1,899 and $1,699 during sales, with Amazon seeing it drop to $1,599 for the first time today (while the on-page coupon there takes things lower) and the brand’s direct site taking things under $1,500 for the first time while these flash savings last, giving you $1,000 in savings at the best new price we have tracked. The bundle on this station and two 200W solar panels is also at a new low of $1,799 shipped, landing $100 under the previous low and $5 under Amazon’s current pricing.
